ingredients.ingredient: 2 pounds fennel bulbs, sliced, green tops reserved
3 tablespoons olive oil, or as needed
1 pinch lemon pepper, or to taste

cookingTips: Slice fennel bulbs uniformly from top to bottom to preserve the natural layers
Cook until golden and caramelized to bring out the natural sweetness
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Show how proper slicing and cooking technique can transform fennel's anise flavor into a sweet, caramelized side dish.
